title: Update step-completion with summary section
description:
Update the completion screen to display the personalized summary above the affirmation list.

Files to modify:
- app/fo-05/components/step-completion.tsx

Changes to StepCompletionProps:
- Add summary: string prop (can be empty)

UI changes:
1. Add a summary section between the heading and the affirmation list
2. Style it as a distinct card with purple accent (matching app theme)
3. Include a small header like 'Your Journey' with a heart/sparkle icon
4. Only show the summary section if summary is non-empty

Design (see spec for ASCII mockup):
- Purple-tinted background box
- Soft rounded corners
- Distinct from the affirmation list but complementary
- Use text-gray-700 for the summary text
acceptance_criteria: npm run build passes; StepCompletion accepts summary prop; summary section renders when summary is non-empty
closed_reason: Added summary section with purple-themed styling, conditional rendering when summary prop is non-empty
